basics.label: Web Developer
basics.name: Alexander Matsievsky
basics.summary: I was introduced to computing by a passionate educator in high school, and never looked back. A decade later, I am a seasoned full-stack web developer who's acquired a wide range of skills while carving people ideas in code. My professional ambitions lay in broadening my expertise with every groundbreaking technology I can get my hands on, without amateurism or spreading too thin.

highlights: Python, Scrapy, Jupyter, pandas, sklearn, Spark, altair
Designed, developed and maintained Scrapy web crawlers
Reverse-engineered sites' JavaScript and network activity, e.g. SPAs, GraphQL, etc.
Performed an extensive analysis of the scraped data sets, including data visualization
Automated maintenance, monitoring and data quality assurance responsibilities
Researched and developed ML solutions, when needed
work.summary: Scrapinghub is a fast growing and diverse technology business turning web content into useful data with a cloud-based web crawling platform, off-the-shelf datasets, and turn-key web scraping services.

highlights: React, Redux, Go
Developed and maintained several React SPAs for accounting
Developed and maintained Go integration microservice
work.summary: Mr. Shoebox is a system that creates entirely new conditions for Entrepreneurs and bookkeeping agencies to communicate with each other quickly, clearly and easily.

highlights: Node.js, Swagger, Neo4j, Kubernetes, Concourse

work.summary: Amperka is a company that helps beginners and non-professionals create their own electronic devices.

highlights: React, Redux
Developed and maintained an SSR SPA serving 100K MAU worldwide
Introduced Babel and PostCSS AST processing for the development pipeline
work.summary: A trusted peer-to-peer community marketplace connecting shoppers and travelers all around the world.

highlights: D3.js, RxJS, OrientDB, Docker
Worked on an internal enterprise infrastructure management dashboard

work.summary: RCNTEC ensures operation of telecommunication networks and information systems and helps hundreds of thousands of people all over the world work effectively.

highlights: Ruby on Rails, Backbone.js
Developed and optimized an EPUB-reader SPA serving 700K MAU worldwide
work.summary: Bookmate is a subscription based e-book service that makes reading accessible to anyone in the world with a mobile phone.

highlights: Java, Backbone.js

Automated bulk JSP i18n with Python-based pipeline
work.summary: Gridnine Systems is an IT consultancy providing software development, internet solutions and IT services.
